name: Orbiter (itch) (Double Dash)
description:
In this game, you fly a Spaceship with teeth, and must avoid, or better yet, shoot down the dragons (who also have teeth) flying towards you. 

Every time you shoot down a dragon, the game gets faster and more difficult. Try to survive and take as many of those dragons with you as possible. 

Controls:
Note: We recommend you play with your Controller (specifically, the joystick on your controller)

Keyboard: 
Movement: WASD
Shooting: K/L - keys
Dashing: Shift
Bomb: Spacebar
Respawning: R - key
Volume: X/Y - keys
Quitting: Esc - key (hold)

Controller: 
Movement: L-Joystick/D-Pad
Shooting: Right Bumper/Face Buttons
Dashing: Triggers
Bomb: Left Bumper
Respawning: Select - Button
Quitting: Start - Button (hold)

Credits: 
Programming: Paul Klockenbrink
Art: Nathan Winter
Music: Eric Skiff - Song Name - A Night Of Dizzy Spells - Available at http://EricSkiff.com/music
